attributes.action: David Cameron and Nick Clegg to leave office
attributes.additional_details: I request that the coalition leave office, stand down as there methods of running our society are atrocious. I've had enough of bigots and liars who are in power as naive and ignorant public vote for the promises and not for the action taken, well done whoever  voted these fascists in power. they've ruined our education system, made our country that little bit closer to becoming a police state and they are bombing libya while making profit and they havent pulled out of afghanistan. TIME  LEAVE BOYS!
